title: How to Make Your Own C4 Car Bomb in Battlefield 2

steps.headline: Play as the special ops kit, as no other kit gets C4.
Get hold of a suitable vehicle, say that nifty looking fast little FAAV.
Enter vehicle by hitting the suitable key for Enter.
Look for the UAV; the commander is surely smart enough to place the UAV at a place where many enemies spawn.
steps.description: He does need something to direct his artillery on.

steps.headline: Speed up, and speed up some more, never mind incoming fire, your fruits of labor will soon pay off.
steps.description: You see that? That group of 2 people? Yes, aim for them!

steps.headline: Jump out!
steps.description: Detonator in hand, press button! With some luck, you should have killed 2, maybe 3 people, but see this is all worth it, because killing yourself doesn't even equal the negative score you will get for blowing up those people, and with some luck you might even survive.

text: Play as the special ops kit, as no other kit gets C4.  Get hold of a suitable vehicle, say that nifty looking fast little FAAV.  Place 2 C4 on vehicle.  Select the detonator.  Enter vehicle by hitting the suitable key for Enter.  Look for the UAV; the commander is surely smart enough to place the UAV at a place where many enemies spawn. He does need something to direct his artillery on. Speed up, and speed up some more, never mind incoming fire, your fruits of labor will soon pay off. You see that? That group of 2 people? Yes, aim for them! Jump out! Detonator in hand, press button! With some luck, you should have killed 2, maybe 3 people, but see this is all worth it, because killing yourself doesn't even equal the negative score you will get for blowing up those people, and with some luck you might even survive.
